page.title: 15Barrington School-Autumn 198
page.content:
At Hallowe'en time every year there is a Punkie Night.We have competitions such as Fancy Dress & Best Decorated Pumpkin.We have many stalls & refreshments are sold.In November the Junior class took part in the B.B.C. Time & Tune concert in the Colston Hall in Bristol.I played my violin & some other children played their recorders.We had a Christmas Bazaar in December selling clothes,toys & books. We all took part in a Christmas concert for our parents.At our Christmas party we joined with Shepton Beauchamp school to be entertained by a magician.After that we had our tea & everyone was given a card & a present from under the Christmas tree.
Rachel Dean aged 9 years.
